name: Cauliflower, String Beans Capers and Tomatoes
keywords: cauliflower, string beans, tomato, side dish, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Slice the tomatoes very thin and place them on an oiled roasting dish. Roast for 30 minutes to an hour, or until they begin to shrivel and get brown around the edges. Remove from the oven, scrape up with a spatula and set aside. They will not hold their shape but this does not matter.
Place the cauliflower and beans in a steamer and steam until cooked. Put them in a serving dish and top with the capers and roasted tomatoes. Sprinkle with pepper, olive oil and Italian parsley.
